com.inrix.sdk.model

Class TripSchedule.RecurringScheduleOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.model.TripSchedule.ScheduleOptions
      • com.inrix.sdk.model.TripSchedule.RecurringScheduleOptions
  • Enclosing class:
    TripSchedule

    public static final class TripSchedule.RecurringScheduleOptions
extends TripSchedule.ScheduleOptions
    Represents the options for a recurring SavedTrip.

    A recurring SavedTrip can be scheduled for the same time on any given day of the week with a weekly cadence. The first occurrence of the SavedTrip will be on the specified date and time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Create a RecurringScheduleOptions with the specified type, date, time, and recurrence.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecurringScheduleOptions

        public RecurringScheduleOptions(TripSchedule.ScheduleType scheduleType,
                        Date dateTime,
                        Collection<Integer> daysOfWeek)
        Create a RecurringScheduleOptions with the specified type, date, time, and recurrence.
        Parameters:
        scheduleType - arrival or departure schedule
        dateTime - date and time of the trip, must not be null
        daysOfWeek - days of the week to schedule the trip, must not be null
        See Also:
        TripSchedule.ScheduleType, Calendar

    • Method Detail

      • getDaysOfWeek

        public Collection<Integer> getDaysOfWeek()
        Get the days of the week the alert should notify the user. The integer values are the days of the week constants from Calendar.
        Returns:
        days of the week to schedule the trip

      • setDaysOfWeek

        public void setDaysOfWeek(Collection<Integer> daysOfWeek)
        Set the days of the week the SavedTrip is scheduled.

        Values in the collection can be any combination of the day constants from Calendar:

        • Calendar.SUNDAY
        • Calendar.MONDAY
        • Calendar.TUESDAY
        • Calendar.WEDNESDAY
        • Calendar.THURSDAY
        • Calendar.FRIDAY
        • Calendar.SATURDAY

        Specifying other values in this collection has undefined behavior.

        Parameters:
        daysOfWeek - days of the week to schedule the trip, must not be null
